author: Screen Junkies
description:
Merry Christmas and happy holidays from Screen Junkies! We’ve got a new Honest Trailer episode queued up for next week, but for now enjoy this compilation of each time we’ve roasted a Christmas movie like chestnuts on an open fire.

Home Alone
Home Alone 2
The Nightmare Before Christmas
Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer
The Santa Claus
Elf
Jingle All the Way
A Christmas Story
How the Grinch Stole Christmas
Red One
Die Hard 

Voice Narration: Jon Bailey the EPIC VOICE GUY (@epicvoiceguy on all socials)
Title Design: Robert Holtby
Written by: Spencer Gilbert and Lon Harris
Produced by: Spencer Gilbert
Edited by: Kevin Williamsen
Post-Production Manager: Emin Bassavand
Manager, Video Operations: Tiffany Tse
Post-Production Specialist: Rebecca Castaneda
VP Content: Max Dionne

#honesttrailers #entertainment #parody #trailer #christmas
title: Honest Trailers | Christmas (Compilation)
